mapper.select: SELECT id,title,sell_point AS sellPoint , price,num,barcode,image,cid,status,created,updated FROM tb_item
SELECT id,parent_id AS parentId,name,status, sort_order AS sortOrder,is_parent AS isParent, created,updated FROM tb_item_cat WHERE parent_id = #{parentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_item (id, title, sell_point, price, num, barcode, image, cid, status, created, updated ) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{sellPoint}, #{price}, #{num}, #{barcode},#{image}, #{cid},1,now(),now())
